text: The 2003 Missouri Valley Conference Men's Basketball Tournament was played from March 7-10, 2003 at the Savvis Center in St. Louis, Missouri at the conclusion of the 2002–2003 regular season. The Creighton Bluejays won their 8th MVC Tournament title to earn an automatic bid to the 2003 NCAA Tournament. ==Tournament Bracket== ==See also== * Missouri Valley Conference == References == Category:2002–03 Missouri Valley Conference men's basketball season Category:Missouri Valley Conference Men's Basketball Tournament
title: 2003 Missouri Valley Conference Men's Basketball Tournament
